name: Floating Fire
description:
Collect coins, and fight your way through a forest and a cave. If you can survive the challenges ahead, something more may lie below...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CONTROLS
WASD - Movement

ESC - Escape

SPACE - ???
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
Currently, there are 3 total levels + a number of secret rooms, and one powerup  you can pick up. More to come later!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
